amendment.description: Amendment sought to delete all funding contained in Title II--Further Hurricane Disaster Relief and Recovery.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 12 printed in the Congressional Record to eliminate all funding in Title II.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Neugebauer amendment (A034) Failed by recorded vote: 89 - 332 (Roll no. 57).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A034) offered by Mr. Neugebauer.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Neugebauer amendment (A034) Failed by recorded vote: 89 - 332 (Roll no. 57).
